name: plantuml-viewer
description: A web application for rendering UML diagrams using PlantUML, with a Node.js backend and a simple HTML frontend
notes: This package.json defines the PlantUML Viewer application. Use 'npm start' to run the server with Node.js, or 'npm run dev' for development with nodemon (auto-restarts on file changes). Dependencies include Express for the server. Ensure plantuml-gplv2-1.2025.3.jar is in the project directory for diagram rendering. Update the repository URL to your actual Git repo.
author: Mohammad Hissin Aon
